list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long, thin strand of cotton, nylon, or other fibers used in sewing or weaving.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he had a loose thread on his shirt
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta có một sợi loãng trên áo sơ mi của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a theme or characteristic, typically forming one of several, running throughout a situation or piece of writing.
a helical ridge on the outside of a screw, bolt, etc. or on the inside of a cylindrical hole, to allow two parts to be screwed together.
pass a thread through the eye of (a needle) or through the needle and guides of (a sewing machine).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I can't even thread a needle
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi thậm chí không thể luồn kim

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pluck hairs from (the eyebrows or another part of the body) using a twisted cotton thread.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I had my eyebrows threaded today
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã có lông mày của tôi luồn ngày hôm nay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cut a screw thread in or on (a hole, screw, bolt, etc.).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we're laser-cutting holes to be threaded for screws
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi là các lỗ cắt laser để được ren cho ốc vít
